name: UglyDolls
description: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

review.author: ilovefoodcoma
review.heading: Positive message in the movie
review.reviewBody: This movie definitely gives a positive message to the kids. Don't let your appearance/looks define who you are. Don't give up your dreams even though you are lack of something. Most important don't judge a book by its cover. This movie is not the best animation but for sure good message through out the movie.

keywords: cgi animation,based on toy,uglydoll,group leader,one word title
